message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SY

This paper discusses the challenges of training deep neural networks, which is a topic that falls under the category of neural networks and machine learning. Therefore, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a metric for measuring the degree of vanishing nodes, which is related to the optimization of the network and falls under the category of machine learning theory, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) the second most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the impact of vanishing nodes on the network's ability to learn simple tasks, which is related to the field of artificial intelligence, making cs.AI the third most likely sub-category. The paper also includes experiments on image classification, which falls under the category of computer vision, making cs.CV the fourth most likely sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the impact of vanishing nodes on the network's representation capability, which is related to the field of control systems, making cs.SY the fifth most likely sub-category.
